title: Terrible Ping increase on Oceanic Server from SEA since 5.18
body: ping increased from 108 to 250 since patch 5.18, This savage ping is stopping plat dreams...

replies.body:
Hey Snarbalon,

Where are you playing from and what ISP? Can you send through a tracert to 103.240.227.1

Cheers
Mindstar
Edit: I send the tracert through the OCE Network Diagnostics hope that helps! thanks for resolving this asap!

Hey Snarbalon

Where are you playing from and which ISP? I wasn't able to match your account to any of the recent submissions.

Mindstar
Im playing from Singapore, Singtel ISP,I sent the logs again

Hey Snarbalon,

It turns out there is a cable cut on the undersea fibre cable which connects Singapore to Perth - with that out of service, it means your traffic has to take a different (much longer) path to get to Sydney, where the game servers are.  It should go back to normal after the cable is fixed.

I posted some other info about it [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/M0OF0eg3-latency-issues?comment=0000000000010000)

Cheers
Mindstar
